comments: liked it a lot at first. Very repetitive in a lot of ways. After you reach a certain level you're at the mercy of other people to advance. The voting system feels flawed, as after a while any photos you submit, regardless how good or bad, are removed or hidden to make room for others, which to me seems unbalanced as a potential winning picture will get tucked away while one submitted at the right time will get more votes and win.

It was a very good site. I used to enjoy the challenges, share my images, see the work of different photographers, but since the last update Feb 6, 2020. the application is working very bad. Impossible to use. - On Feb 21, after a few another updates it's still the same. Slow, freezing, collapsing. Could you please fix it finally?

I use gurushots everyday! as a photographer, it helps me think of things i would never take pictures of! the system is easy and ayone can "play". I am really happy I came across this app and I think if you really like picture taking to give it a try! I cant wait for the day I become a Guru!! If you wanna see my stuff look for Chloes Canon Captures! Thanks! 😊

Finally!!! You got rid of the swipe method! See? I had given you guys a 1 star but now changed it back to 5! Another plus is the layout is great, I like that there's no clutter, thanks for bringing back the old voting system, now it's fun again playing gurushots.

This is a great app and I really enjoy everything about it but the only reason I give this app 3 stars is that everytime I try to reset my password It goes straight to the sign in menu from the rest password link it sends to my email this is extremely annoying and a waste of time please fix this problem it would really make a difference

title: FamilyAlbum - Easy Photo & Video Sharing
description:
The best way to safely share and organize your family’s photos and videos. Unlimited storage, no ads, and it’s free!

3 Reasons to Start Your Album:

1) You’ll love it

- YOUR MEMORIES ON DISPLAY. Show off your photos and videos in a way that’s both beautiful and intuitive. Everything is automatically sorted by month, complete with your child’s age. Just swipe the screen to go back in time!

- UNLIMITED STORAGE. Back up all your memories for free.

- STREAMLINED SHARING. No more sharing the same photo with five different group chats. All your photos, all your videos, all your favorite people, all in one place.

- YOUR PRIVACY IS OUR PRIORITY. Your album is completely private. All content you upload to the app belongs to you, and it can only be viewed by you and the family and friends you invite. That also means the app is ad-free and we don't share your data with advertisers. Read more at https://family-album.com/privacy.

- COMPILATION VIDEOS. The app automatically pieces together 1-second clips of your memories into short, touching movies. Tissues not included!

- PHOTOBOOKS. Get photobooks delivered to your doorstep. The app sends you suggestions every month—order as-is or create your own in minutes!

- VISIBILITY CONTROLS. Decide what to show to the whole family and what to keep private between you and your partner.

- IT’S ACTUALLY FREE. We make money two ways: (1) when you purchase a photobook or other product from the app and (2) when you register for our Premium service, which adds bonus features to our already-awesome free version. Don’t worry, we'll never show you ads or charge for features currently available for free.

2) Your family will love it

- EASY TO USE. Our app is optimized to make viewing shared content easy. Family members that have trouble using other apps will have no trouble using FamilyAlbum. There’s also a browser version.

- STAY CLOSE. FamilyAlbum is a great way to let distant loved ones feel included. But unlike messenger apps, there’s no pressure to react right away. That also means you don’t have to wait for a reason to share!

3) Your child will love it

- BUILD THEIR STORY, PRIVATELY. Start a curated collection of photos, videos, and comments to look back on when they’re older—without compromising their privacy.

What Users Are Saying:
“Love it! Great way for family to see and not post on social media.”
“Is AMAZING!! I love it!! I'm far away from my family and this is perfect so they can see my baby growing up”
“This app is just so awesome! Easy to use and all of the family can see our little girl grow! A great way to share and be connected!”

Awards:
・Mom’s Choice Awards Gold Recipient
・Official Webby Honoree for Best User Experience
・National Parenting Product Award (NAPPA)
・W³ Awards Gold Winner

All the features listed above are FREE. You can also upgrade to our Premium service and unlock extra features for the whole family. With Premium, you can view photos/videos sorted by child, write monthly journal entries, upload longer videos, and upload from your computer. Plus, you’ll get more 1s Movie compilations, free shipping, additional sharing options, and more! Start with a 1-month free trial and, after that, it’s only $4.99 US/month. To register, open the Settings tab and tap Premium.

If you subscribe to Premium, your subscription will automatically renew every month unless you disable automatic renewal at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. Prices may vary by country. You can manage your subscription settings by visiting your account page in the Play Store. For more details, see the Terms of Use for our Premium service at https://family-album.com/premium_terms.
*Automatic renewal for Premium can only be cancelled via your Play Store account.

FamilyAlbum Website - https://family-album.com
Privacy Policy - https://family-album.com/privacy

If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact us at support@family-album.com.

comments: Love this app! Had it set up ready to go while I was pregnant and now I upload whatever I want to share with just family, no clogging up their phone, they look at and save whatever pictures or videos they like. A perfect way to share intimately without publishing to the world on social media. Brownie points for: 1. Photos being automatically sorted chronologically 2. Remembering what you've uploaded and not showing them as options next time (no doubles caused by baby brain!)

I adore this app! I downloaded it so I wouldn't have to remember to send all the pictures to a bunch of family members separately, but I quickly started using it to look through it myself. I love that the pictures are automatically sorted by date and that you can't accidentally upload the same image twice. This thing has become addictive already 🤣

My family and I live over 700 miles from my sisters. I downloaded this app after my son was born to share photos. It has been AMAZING!!! It's very easy to use and organizes the photos nicely. While it has let my sisters stay connected with their nephew, it has also let me have a ready to go album to scroll through of my little boy! Highly recommend!

My entire family has had this app since my son was born and it has been great! Everyone can upload their pictures and see/comment on all of the photos. The videos that are created for each month and year are amazing. I recommend this app to all families, especially with the arrival of a new baby!

Honestly, I was a bit skeptical if this app would be helpful... My concerns were 1. if my family was actually going to use it and 2. was it going to be one more tedious thing I would have to keep up with. I am happy to say we have been using this app for 6 months and still love it! Both sets of grandparents (as well as aunts/uncles) still open the app often to check out new pics. And it actually lightened the load of texting pics to different people. Love this app!!!

title: Christmas Photo Frames, Effects & Cards Art 🎄 🎅
description:
Get a huge collection of charming New Year and Christmas photo frames and effects with 'Christmas Photo Frames'! You will definitely find an effect that suits your needs among 50+ beautifully designed templates. Make personalized Christmas cards easily and surprise all your friends during the holiday season!

Creating holiday e-cards with 'Christmas Photo Frames' is as simple as ABC: 
 A) Choose a template from the huge collection
 B) Select photo(s) from your Gallery or Camera
 C) Add a text of your own and share the result! 

Here are some great ideas of photo effects you can make with 'Christmas Photo Frames':
* Wear various Christmas hats and put them on your contacts :)) Choose between Red and Blue Santa Hats, Snow Maiden Hat and Antlers Headband.
* Put your photo into a 2020 frame or create your photo calendar 2020.
* Winterize your phone background image with icy and frozen patterns. 
* Decorate your photos with realistic Christmas baubles, fireworks and garlands!
* Let little cute cartoon dragons play with your photos :]  

A resulting image can be set as a contact icon or wallpaper or saved to the phone memory or SD card. You can also send an e-card you made as an MMS or post it on Facebook and Twitter to share it with your friends!

recentChanges: This version solves several stability issues. You are unlikely to notice them, but Xmas Frames should be running a little faster now.
comments: I absolutely love this app! The huge variety of different categories to transform your pictures w/is amazing. And all for free! Its beyond user friendly which I love. And it's so much more than xmas frames. All different holidays & special occasions. You can change lighting, background, do overlays, etc. If there are ads they are few and far between. I used this app to make my sisters xmas cards, my cards, and two friends their xmas cards. I plan on using this app much more often! Thank you!

Fantastic app!!! It so much fun to use!!! Merry Christmas 🎄🎅🎁 to all!!! This is the best photo app ever!!! They also have other fun frames on here that are not Christmas. They have other holidays as well.

Awesome App!!! Has loads of frames for any holiday or event. Also has animations, can change colors or lighting and also let's you personalize text. Best frame all I have ever had, & so easy!! Keep up the great work!
I love this app! It turns your ordinary photos into pieces of art! I haven't found any flaws other than im a bit impatient waiting for the photos to finish! Lol
The transfer of pics to frame is not that great. My pictures were shades and shades darker than the original. Not sure if it's because our skin's black. Heard of some AI or cameras that do this
